title: XDM Business Campaign Member Additional Properties

xdm:campaignMember.title: Campaign Member
xdm:campaignMember.description: Member type and associated reference ID

xdm:type.title: Member type
xdm:type.description: Member's type e.g. lead or contact

xdm:response.title: Response of the Member
xdm:response.description: Record whether the member has responded to the workflow stage

xdm:responded.title: Response of the Member
xdm:responded.description: Record whether the member has responded to the workflow stage

xdm:respondDate.title: Date captured on which response was submitted
xdm:respondDate.description: Date of the response by the Member

xdm:campaignProgram.title: Campaign's Program
xdm:campaignProgram.description: The name and the type of the program with which the campaign is associated, eg, 'Tradeshow'->'Event'

xdm:ID.title: Campaign Program ID
xdm:ID.description: Program ID with which the campaign is associated

xdm:type.title: Campaign Program Type
xdm:type.description: Program Type with which the campaign is associated

xdm:stepNumber.title: Campaign Program's control workflow step number
xdm:stepNumber.description: Program's workflow step number with which the campaign is associated

xdm:stepName.title: Campaign Program Step Name
xdm:stepName.description: Program Step Name based on Step number with which the campaign is associated

xdm:sourceType.title: Campaign Source Type
xdm:sourceType.description: The upstream source from where the campaign record has been syncronized

xdm:deleted.title: Campaign soft delete status
xdm:deleted.description: A boolean flag which indicates whether the campaign is soft deleted in the system
